div.pre: 2115 Giarre Riposto, 20 km. S of Taor- (432) mina, c. 1907 Burial: early 4th cent. B.C. (K) Contents: 3+ AR Naxus: 1 tetradr. (Cahn 106.1) Ziz: 2 tetradr. (early types) Disposition: Jameson 3 (nos. 678, 689-90) Jameson Cat 4 (1932), "Erratum supplemen- taire," nos. 678, 689-90. Nos. 689-90 were acquired from Egger Sale, Jan. 1908 (nos. 54-5), and are a part of a group of Ziz tetradr. (nos. 54-61), which may come from a single hd. No. 678 came from Hirsch Sale Nov. 11, 1907, no. 214, which includes two more similar Ziz tetradr., and two very rare tetradr. of Panormus
